key_risks: Economic Sensitivity: Exposure to economic fluctuations in the Western U.S., particularly in agriculture, real estate, and small businesses.
Regulatory Risks: Ongoing scrutiny from federal and state regulatory bodies, particularly concerning AML and consumer protection laws.
Competition: Intense competition from larger national banks, credit unions, and fintech firms.
Integration Risks: Challenges related to the integration of acquired banks, such as Altabancorp and Heritage Bank of Nevada.
Interest Rate Volatility: Sensitivity to changes in interest rates affecting net interest income and overall financial performance.
controversies: Limited customer complaints: 2 complaints closed in the last 3 years and 1 in the last 12 months.
environmental_issues: Sustainability efforts as part of ESG initiatives.
social_issues: Community development programs as part of ESG initiatives.
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance and risk oversight committees to monitor adherence to consumer-related laws and manage risks effectively.
